snippet.title: CRYPTARK Early Access Trailer - Oct 7th
snippet.description:
http://store.steampowered.com//app/344740
http://www.cryptark.com/

Cryptark is a 2D sci-fi roguelike shooter where you take on the role of a heavily armed privateer seeking to earn government contracts by boarding deadly alien space-hulks. Each of the ancient derelicts is a hornet's nest of cybernetic drones and security systems you must you must traverse. It's up to you to strategize a plan of attack, pick an equipment loadout, and destroy the central core to be victorious.
